df-evls1
blocks.content: Define the evaluation map for the univariate polynomial algebra. The function ` ( S evalSub1 R ) : V --> ( S ^m S ) ` makes sense when ` S ` is a ring and ` R ` is a subring of ` S ` , and where ` V ` is the set of polynomials in ` ( Poly1 `` R ) ` . This function maps an element of the formal polynomial algebra (with coefficients in ` R ` ) to a function from assignments to the variable from ` S ` into an element of ` S ` formed by evaluating the polynomial with the given assignment. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Jun-2015.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-evls1(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  |- wceq(ces1, cmpo(s0, s1, universe, cpw(cfv(cbs, cv(s0))), csb(s2, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), ccom(cmpt(s3, co(cv(s2), cmap, co(cv(s2), cmap, c1o)), ccom(cv(s3), cmpt(s4, cv(s2), cxp(c1o, csn(cv(s4)))))), cfv(co(c1o, ces, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-evls1(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  ‚ä¢ evalSub1 =(s0 ‚àà ùïå, s1 ‚àà P((Base ` s0))‚Ü¶[(Base ` s0)/ s2]((s3 ‚àà(s2[‚Ü¶](s2[‚Ü¶]1o))‚Ü¶(s3 ‚àò(s4 ‚àà s2 ‚Ü¶(1o √ó { s4 }))))‚àò((1o[evalSub]s0)` s1)))
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s4)
}

blocks.name: df-evl1
blocks.content: Define the evaluation map for the univariate polynomial algebra. The function ` ( eval1 `` R ) : V --> ( R ^m R ) ` makes sense when ` R ` is a ring, and ` V ` is the set of polynomials in ` ( Poly1 `` R ) ` . This function maps an element of the formal polynomial algebra (with coefficients in ` R ` ) to a function from assignments to the variable from ` R ` into an element of ` R ` formed by evaluating the polynomial with the given assignment. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Jun-2015.)

axiom df-evl1(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(ce1, cmpt(s0, universe, csb(s1, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), ccom(cmpt(s2, co(cv(s1), cmap, co(cv(s1), cmap, c1o)), ccom(cv(s2), cmpt(s3, cv(s1), cxp(c1o, csn(cv(s3)))))), co(c1o, cevl, cv(s0))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)

  -| diffss(s2, s3)
}

blocks.name: ply1frcl
blocks.content: Reverse closure for the set of univariate polynomial functions. (Contributed by AV, 9-Sep-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm ply1frcl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c3, cpw(cfv(cbs, c2)))))
  -| wceq(c1, crn(co(c2, ces1, c3)))
} = {
  3syl(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c3, cpw(cfv(cbs, c2)))), wne(crn(co(c2, ces1, c3)), emptycls), wne(co(c2, ces1, c3), emptycls))
  eleq2s(c0, c1, crn(co(c2, ces1, c3)), wne(crn(co(c2, ces1, c3)), emptycls))
  ne0i(c0, crn(co(c2, ces1, c3)))
  necon3i(crn(co(c2, ces1, c3)), emptycls, co(c2, ces1, c3), emptycls)
  syl6eq(crn(co(c2, ces1, c3)), emptycls, crn(emptycls), wceq(co(c2, ces1, c3), emptycls))
  rneq(co(c2, ces1, c3), emptycls)
  rn0()
  sylbi(wne(co(c2, ces1, c3), emptycls), wa(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c3, cpw(cfv(cbs, c2)))), wex(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, ces1, c3))))
  n0(hs0, co(c2, ces1, c3))
  exlimiv(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, ces1, c3)), wa(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c3, cpw(cfv(cbs, c2)))))
  sylib(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, ces1, c3)), wa(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c3, cpw(cfv(cbs, c2)))), wcel(cop(c2, c3), ciun(hs1, universe, cxp(csn(cv(hs1)), cpw(cfv(cbs, cv(hs1)))))))
  sseldi(cop(c2, c3), ciun(hs1, universe, cxp(csn(cv(hs1)), cpw(cfv(cbs, cv(hs1))))), cdm(ces1), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, ces1, c3)))
  dmmpt2ssx(hs1, hs2, ces1, universe, cpw(cfv(cbs, cv(hs1))), csb(hs3, cfv(cbs, cv(hs1)), ccom(cmpt(hs4, co(cv(hs3), cmap, co(cv(hs3), cmap, c1o)), ccom(cv(hs4), cmpt(hs5, cv(hs3), cxp(c1o, csn(cv(hs5)))))), cfv(co(c1o, ces, cv(hs1)), cv(hs2)))))
  df-evls1(hs1, hs2, hs3, hs4, hs5)
  eleq2s(cv(hs0), co(c2, ces1, c3), cfv(ces1, cop(c2, c3)), wcel(cop(c2, c3), cdm(ces1)))
  elfvdm(cv(hs0), ces1, cop(c2, c3))
  df-ov(c2, ces1, c3)
  opeliunxp2(hs1, c2, c3, universe, cpw(cfv(cbs, cv(hs1))), cpw(cfv(cbs, c2)))
  pweqd(cfv(cbs, cv(hs1)), cfv(cbs, c2), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  fveq2(cv(hs1), c2, cbs)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c2, ces1, c3))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c3, cpw(cfv(cbs, c2)))))
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
  diff.hs2.c(universe)
  diff.hs2.c(cpw(cfv(cbs, cv(hs1))))
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diff.hs1.s(hs3)
  diff.hs3.s(hs4)
  diff.hs3.s(hs5)
  diff.hs2.s(hs4)
  diff.hs2.s(hs5)
  diff.hs1.s(hs4)
  diff.hs1.s(hs5)
  diff.hs4.s(hs5)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(cpw(cfv(cbs, c2)))
}

thm ply1frcl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(c2 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c3 ‚àà P((Base ` c2))))
  ‚ä£ c1 = ran((c2[evalSub1]c3))
} = {
  3syl(c0 ‚àà c1, (c2 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c3 ‚àà P((Base ` c2))), ran((c2[evalSub1]c3))‚â† ‚àÖ, (c2[evalSub1]c3)‚â† ‚àÖ)
  eleq2s(c0, c1, ran((c2[evalSub1]c3)), ran((c2[evalSub1]c3))‚â† ‚àÖ)
  ne0i(c0, ran((c2[evalSub1]c3)))

  rneq((c2[evalSub1]c3), emptycls)
  rn0()
  sylbi((c2[evalSub1]c3)‚â† ‚àÖ, (c2 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c3 ‚àà P((Base ` c2))), ‚àÉ(hs0, hs0 ‚àà(c2[evalSub1]c3)))
  n0(hs0, (c2[evalSub1]c3))
  exlimiv(hs0, hs0 ‚àà(c2[evalSub1]c3), (c2 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c3 ‚àà P((Base ` c2))))
  sylib(hs0 ‚àà(c2[evalSub1]c3), (c2 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c3 ‚àà P((Base ` c2))), < c2, c3 > ‚àà ‚ãÉ(hs1 ‚àà ùïå,({ hs1 } √ó P((Base ` hs1)))))
  sseldi(< c2, c3 >, ‚ãÉ(hs1 ‚àà ùïå,({ hs1 } √ó P((Base ` hs1)))), dom(evalSub1), hs0 ‚àà(c2[evalSub1]c3))
  dmmpt2ssx(hs1, hs2, ces1, universe, P((Base ` hs1)), [(Base ` hs1)/ hs3]((hs4 ‚àà(hs3[‚Ü¶](hs3[‚Ü¶]1o))‚Ü¶(hs4 ‚àò(hs5 ‚àà hs3 ‚Ü¶(1o √ó { hs5 }))))‚àò((1o[evalSub]hs1)` hs2)))
  df-evls1(hs1, hs2, hs3, hs4, hs5)
  eleq2s(hs0, (c2[evalSub1]c3), (evalSub1 ` < c2, c3 >), < c2, c3 > ‚àà dom(evalSub1))
  elfvdm(hs0, ces1, < c2, c3 >)
  df-ov(c2, ces1, c3)

  fveq2(hs1, c2, cbs)
  diff.hs0.c((c2[evalSub1]c3))
  diff.hs0.w((c2 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c3 ‚àà P((Base ` c2))))
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
  diff.hs2.c(universe)
  diff.hs2.c(P((Base ` hs1)))
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diff.hs1.s(hs3)
  diff.hs3.s(hs4)
  diff.hs3.s(hs5)
  diff.hs2.s(hs4)
  diff.hs2.s(hs5)
  diff.hs1.s(hs4)
  diff.hs1.s(hs5)
  diff.hs4.s(hs5)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)

blocks.name: evls1rhmlem
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ evl1rhm and ~ evls1rhm (formerly part of the proof of ~ evl1rhm ): The first function of the composition forming the univariate polynomial evaluation map function for a (sub)ring is a ring homomorphism. (Contributed by AV, 11-Sep-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm evls1rhmlem(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, co(co(c0, cpws, co(c2, cmap, c1o)), crh, c3)))

  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  eqeltrd(c1, co(co(c0, cpws, co(c2, cmap, c1o)), crh, c3), cmpt(s0, cfv(cbs, co(c0, cpws, co(c2, cmap, c1o))), ccom(cv(s0), cmpt(s1, c2, cxp(c1o, csn(cv(s1)))))), wcel(c0, ccrg))
  syl5eq(c1, cmpt(s0, cfv(cbs, co(c0, cpws, co(c2, cmap, c1o))), ccom(cv(s0), cmpt(s1, c2, cxp(c1o, csn(cv(s1)))))), cmpt(s0, co(c2, cmap, co(c2, cmap, c1o)), ccom(cv(s0), cmpt(s1, c2, cxp(c1o, csn(cv(s1)))))), wcel(c0, ccrg))
  mpteq1d(s0, co(c2, cmap, co(c2, cmap, c1o)), ccom(cv(s0), cmpt(s1, c2, cxp(c1o, csn(cv(s1))))), cfv(cbs, co(c0, cpws, co(c2, cmap, c1o))), wcel(c0, ccrg))
  mpan2(wcel(c0, ccrg), wceq(co(c2, cmap, co(c2, cmap, c1o)), cfv(cbs, co(c0, cpws, co(c2, cmap, c1o)))), wcel(co(c2, cmap, c1o), universe))

  a1i(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c2, universe))
  a1i(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(co(c2, cmap, c1o), universe))
  ovex(c2, cmap, c1o)
  mp1i(wcel(c0, ccrg), wf(cmpt(s1, c2, cxp(c1o, csn(cv(s1)))), c2, co(c2, cmap, c1o)), wf1o(cmpt(s1, c2, cxp(c1o, csn(cv(s1)))), c2, co(c2, cmap, c1o)))

blocks.name: evls1rhm
blocks.content: Polynomial evaluation is a homomorphism (into the product ring). (Contributed by AV, 11-Sep-2019.)

  mp3an1(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, cfv(csubrg, c0)), wcel(cfv(co(c1o, ces, c0), c1), co(co(c1o, cmpl, c6), crh, co(c0, cpws, co(c5, cmap, c1o)))), wcel(c1o, con0))

thm evl1fval1lem(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, co(c0, ces1, c3)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(ce1, c0))

} = {
  3eqtr4a(c2, co(c0, ces1, c3), cfv(ce1, c0), ccom(cmpt(hs0, co(c3, cmap, co(c3, cmap, c1o)), ccom(cv(hs0), cmpt(hs1, c3, cxp(c1o, csn(cv(hs1)))))), co(c1o, cevl, c0)), wcel(c0, c1))
  evl1fval(hs0, hs1, cfv(ce1, c0), c3, co(c1o, cevl, c0), c0)
  eqid(cfv(ce1, c0))
  a1i(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, cfv(ce1, c0)))
  syl6eq(co(c0, ces1, c3), ccom(cmpt(hs0, co(c3, cmap, co(c3, cmap, c1o)), ccom(cv(hs0), cmpt(hs1, c3, cxp(c1o, csn(cv(hs1)))))), co(c1o, cevl, c0)), ccom(cmpt(hs0, co(c3, cmap, co(c3, cmap, c1o)), ccom(cv(hs0), cmpt(hs1, c3, cxp(c1o, csn(cv(hs1)))))), cfv(co(c1o, ces, c0), c3)), wcel(c0, c1))
  mpan2(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(co(c0, ces1, c3), ccom(cmpt(hs0, co(c3, cmap, co(c3, cmap, c1o)), ccom(cv(hs0), cmpt(hs1, c3, cxp(c1o, csn(cv(hs1)))))), cfv(co(c1o, ces, c0), c3))), wcel(c3, cpw(c3)))
  pwid(c3)
  fvexi(c3, cbs, c0)
  evls1fval(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c3, c3, co(c0, ces1, c3), co(c1o, ces, c0))
  eqid(co(c0, ces1, c3))
  eqid(co(c1o, ces, c0))
  coeq2i(cmpt(hs0, co(c3, cmap, co(c3, cmap, c1o)), ccom(cv(hs0), cmpt(hs1, c3, cxp(c1o, csn(cv(hs1)))))), cfv(co(c1o, ces, c0), c3), co(c1o, cevl, c0))
  eqcomi(cfv(co(c1o, ces, c0), c3), co(c1o, cevl, c0))
  evlval(co(c1o, cevl, c0), c1o, c0, c3)
  eqid(co(c1o, cevl, c0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)

  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)

blocks.name: evl1rhm

thm evl1rhm(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, co(c2, crh, c3)))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(ce1, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cpl1, c0))

  syl5eqel(c1, co(c2, crh, c3), ccom(cmpt(hs0, co(c4, cmap, co(c4, cmap, c1o)), ccom(cv(hs0), cmpt(hs1, c4, cxp(c1o, csn(cv(hs1)))))), co(c1o, cevl, c0)), wcel(c0, ccrg))
  evl1fval(hs0, hs1, c1, c4, co(c1o, cevl, c0), c0)

  evls1rhmlem(hs0, hs1, c0, cmpt(hs0, co(c4, cmap, co(c4, cmap, c1o)), ccom(cv(hs0), cmpt(hs1, c4, cxp(c1o, csn(cv(hs1)))))), c4, c3)
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, co(c4, cmap, co(c4, cmap, c1o)), ccom(cv(hs0), cmpt(hs1, c4, cxp(c1o, csn(cv(hs1)))))))
  eleqtrrd(co(c1o, cevl, c0), co(c2, crh, co(c0, cpws, co(c4, cmap, c1o))), co(co(c1o, cmpl, c0), crh, co(c0, cpws, co(c4, cmap, c1o))), wcel(c0, ccrg))
  mpan(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(co(c1o, cevl, c0), co(co(c1o, cmpl, c0), crh, co(c0, cpws, co(c4, cmap, c1o)))), wcel(c1o, con0))
  1on()
  evlrhm(c1o, con0, c0, co(c1o, cevl, c0), co(c1o, cmpl, c0), co(c0, cpws, co(c4, cmap, c1o)), c4)
  eqid(co(c1o, cevl, c0))
  eqid(co(c0, cpws, co(c4, cmap, c1o)))
  rhmpropd(hs0, hs1, c2, co(c0, cpws, co(c4, cmap, c1o)), co(c1o, cmpl, c0), co(c0, cpws, co(c4, cmap, c1o)), cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, co(c0, cpws, co(c4, cmap, c1o))), wcel(c0, ccrg))
  eqidd(cfv(cbs, c2), wcel(c0, ccrg))
  a1i(wcel(c0, ccrg), wceq(cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmpl, c0))))
  ply1bas(cfv(cbs, c2), c0, c2, cfv(cps1, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cps1, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c2))
  eqidd(cfv(cbs, co(c0, cpws, co(c4, cmap, c1o))), wcel(c0, ccrg))
  oveqdr(hs0, hs1, cfv(cplusg, c2), cfv(cplusg, co(c1o, cmpl, c0)), wcel(c0, ccrg), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c2))))
  a1i(wcel(c0, ccrg), wceq(cfv(cplusg, c2), cfv(cplusg, co(c1o, cmpl, c0))))
  ply1plusg(cfv(cplusg, c2), co(c1o, cmpl, c0), c2, c0)
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c2))
  eqidd(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, co(c0, cpws, co(c4, cmap, c1o))), cv(hs1)), wa(wcel(c0, ccrg), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, co(c0, cpws, co(c4, cmap, c1o)))), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, co(c0, cpws, co(c4, cmap, c1o)))))))
  oveqdr(hs0, hs1, cfv(cmulr, c2), cfv(cmulr, co(c1o, cmpl, c0)), wcel(c0, ccrg), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c2))))
  a1i(wcel(c0, ccrg), wceq(cfv(cmulr, c2), cfv(cmulr, co(c1o, cmpl, c0))))
  ply1mulr(cfv(cmulr, c2), co(c1o, cmpl, c0), c2, c0)
  eqid(co(c1o, cmpl, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cmulr, c2))
  eqidd(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmulr, co(c0, cpws, co(c4, cmap, c1o))), cv(hs1)), wa(wcel(c0, ccrg), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, co(c0, cpws, co(c4, cmap, c1o)))), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, co(c0, cpws, co(c4, cmap, c1o)))))))
  rhmco(cmpt(hs0, co(c4, cmap, co(c4, cmap, c1o)), ccom(cv(hs0), cmpt(hs1, c4, cxp(c1o, csn(cv(hs1)))))), co(c0, cpws, co(c4, cmap, c1o)), c3, co(c1o, cevl, c0), c2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c1o, cevl, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, cpws, co(c4, cmap, c1o)))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c1o, cmpl, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, co(c0, cpws, co(c4, cmap, c1o))))
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(co(c0, cpws, co(c4, cmap, c1o)))
  diff.hs1.c(co(c1o, cmpl, c0))
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cbs, c2))
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cbs, co(c0, cpws, co(c4, cmap, c1o))))

  diff.hs1.w(wcel(c0, ccrg))

thm evl1rhm(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà CRing ‚Üí c1 ‚àà(c2[RingHom]c3))
  ‚ä£ c1 =(eval1 ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Poly1 ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(c0[^]c4)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(Base ` c0)
} = {
  syl5eqel(c1, (c2[RingHom]c3), ((hs0 ‚àà(c4[‚Ü¶](c4[‚Ü¶]1o))‚Ü¶(hs0 ‚àò(hs1 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶(1o √ó { hs1 }))))‚àò(1o[eval]c0)), c0 ‚àà CRing)
  evl1fval(hs0, hs1, c1, c4, (1o[eval]c0), c0)
  syl2anc(c0 ‚àà CRing, ((hs0 ‚àà(c4[‚Ü¶](c4[‚Ü¶]1o))‚Ü¶(hs0 ‚àò(hs1 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶(1o √ó { hs1 }))))‚àò(1o[eval]c0))‚àà(c2[RingHom]c3), (hs0 ‚àà(c4[‚Ü¶](c4[‚Ü¶]1o))‚Ü¶(hs0 ‚àò(hs1 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶(1o √ó { hs1 }))))‚àà((c0[^](c4[‚Ü¶]1o))[RingHom]c3), (1o[eval]c0)‚àà(c2[RingHom](c0[^](c4[‚Ü¶]1o))))
  evls1rhmlem(hs0, hs1, c0, (hs0 ‚àà(c4[‚Ü¶](c4[‚Ü¶]1o))‚Ü¶(hs0 ‚àò(hs1 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶(1o √ó { hs1 })))), c4, c3)
  eqid((hs0 ‚àà(c4[‚Ü¶](c4[‚Ü¶]1o))‚Ü¶(hs0 ‚àò(hs1 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶(1o √ó { hs1 })))))
  eleqtrrd((1o[eval]c0), (c2[RingHom](c0[^](c4[‚Ü¶]1o))), ((1o[mPoly]c0)[RingHom](c0[^](c4[‚Ü¶]1o))), c0 ‚àà CRing)
  mpan(c0 ‚àà CRing, (1o[eval]c0)‚àà((1o[mPoly]c0)[RingHom](c0[^](c4[‚Ü¶]1o))), 1o ‚àà On)
  1on()
  evlrhm(c1o, con0, c0, (1o[eval]c0), (1o[mPoly]c0), (c0[^](c4[‚Ü¶]1o)), c4)
  eqid((1o[eval]c0))
  eqid((c0[^](c4[‚Ü¶]1o)))
  rhmpropd(hs0, hs1, c2, (c0[^](c4[‚Ü¶]1o)), (1o[mPoly]c0), (c0[^](c4[‚Ü¶]1o)), (Base ` c2), (Base `(c0[^](c4[‚Ü¶]1o))), c0 ‚àà CRing)
  eqidd((Base ` c2), c0 ‚àà CRing)
  a1i(c0 ‚àà CRing, (Base ` c2)=(Base `(1o[mPoly]c0)))
  ply1bas((Base ` c2), c0, c2, (PwSer1 ` c0))
  eqid((PwSer1 ` c0))
  eqid((Base ` c2))
  eqidd((Base `(c0[^](c4[‚Ü¶]1o))), c0 ‚àà CRing)
  oveqdr(hs0, hs1, (+ ` c2), (+ `(1o[mPoly]c0)), c0 ‚àà CRing, (hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c2)‚àß hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c2)))
  a1i(c0 ‚àà CRing, (+ ` c2)=(+ `(1o[mPoly]c0)))
  ply1plusg((+ ` c2), (1o[mPoly]c0), c2, c0)
  eqid((+ ` c2))
  eqidd((hs0[(+ `(c0[^](c4[‚Ü¶]1o)))]hs1), (c0 ‚àà CRing ‚àß(hs0 ‚àà(Base `(c0[^](c4[‚Ü¶]1o)))‚àß hs1 ‚àà(Base `(c0[^](c4[‚Ü¶]1o))))))
  oveqdr(hs0, hs1, (√ó ` c2), (√ó `(1o[mPoly]c0)), c0 ‚àà CRing, (hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c2)‚àß hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c2)))
  a1i(c0 ‚àà CRing, (√ó ` c2)=(√ó `(1o[mPoly]c0)))
  ply1mulr((√ó ` c2), (1o[mPoly]c0), c2, c0)
  eqid((1o[mPoly]c0))

  eqidd((hs0[(√ó `(c0[^](c4[‚Ü¶]1o)))]hs1), (c0 ‚àà CRing ‚àß(hs0 ‚àà(Base `(c0[^](c4[‚Ü¶]1o)))‚àß hs1 ‚àà(Base `(c0[^](c4[‚Ü¶]1o))))))

  diff.hs0.s(hs1)

blocks.name: fveval1fvcl
blocks.content: The function value of the evaluation function of a polynomial is an element of the underlying ring. (Contributed by AV, 17-Sep-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm fveval1fvcl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(cfv(c0, c1), c2), c3))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(ce1, c4))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cpl1, c4))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, ccrg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c6))
} = {
  ffvelrnd(cfv(c0, c1), c2, c3, c3, w0)
  pwselbas(cfv(c0, c1), c3, c3, co(c4, cpws, c3), c4, cfv(cbs, co(c4, cpws, c3)), ccrg, universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(c3, universe))
  fvexi(c3, cbs, c4)
  ffvelrnd(c0, c1, cfv(cbs, co(c4, cpws, c3)), c6, w0)
  3syl(w0, wf(c0, c6, cfv(cbs, co(c4, cpws, c3))), wcel(c4, ccrg), wcel(c0, co(c5, crh, co(c4, cpws, c3))))
  evl1rhm(c4, c0, c5, co(c4, cpws, c3), c3)
  eqid(co(c4, cpws, c3))
  rhmf(c0, c5, co(c4, cpws, c3), c6, cfv(cbs, co(c4, cpws, c3)))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, co(c4, cpws, c3)))
}

thm fveval1fvcl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí((c0 ` c1)` c2)‚àà c3)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(eval1 ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(Poly1 ` c4)

} = {
  ffvelrnd((c0 ` c1), c2, c3, c3, w0)
  pwselbas((c0 ` c1), c3, c3, (c4[^]c3), c4, (Base `(c4[^]c3)), ccrg, universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, c3 ‚àà ùïå)

  3syl(w0, (c0 : c6 ‚Üí(Base `(c4[^]c3))), c4 ‚àà CRing, c0 ‚àà(c5[RingHom](c4[^]c3)))
  evl1rhm(c4, c0, c5, (c4[^]c3), c3)
  eqid((c4[^]c3))

}

blocks.name: evl1sca
blocks.content: Polynomial evaluation maps scalars to constant functions. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Jun-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm evl1sca(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(c3, cfv(c4, c1)), cxp(c2, csn(c1))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(ce1, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cpl1, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cascl, c5))

  3syl(wa(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, c2)), wfn(cfv(ce1, c0), cfv(cbs, cfv(cpl1, c0))), wcel(cfv(ce1, c0), co(cfv(cpl1, c0), crh, co(c0, cpws, c2))), wf(cfv(ce1, c0), cfv(cbs, cfv(cpl1, c0)), cfv(cbs, co(c0, cpws, c2))))

  syl(wa(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, c2)), wf(cfv(cascl, cfv(cpl1, c0)), c2, cfv(cbs, cfv(cpl1, c0))), wcel(c0, crg))

  syl2anc(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(cfv(cfv(ce1, c0), cfv(cv1, c0)), crn(cfv(ce1, c0))), wfn(cfv(ce1, c0), cfv(cbs, cfv(cpl1, c0))), wcel(cfv(cv1, c0), cfv(cbs, cfv(cpl1, c0))))

  evl1rhm(c0, cfv(ce1, c0), cfv(cpl1, c0), co(c0, cpws, c1), c1)
  eqid(cfv(ce1, c0))
  eqid(co(c0, cpws, c1))

  eqid(cfv(cbs, co(c0, cpws, c1)))

blocks.name: pf1f
blocks.content: Polynomial functions are functions. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Jun-2015.)

thm pf1f(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c0, c2, c2))
  -| wceq(c1, crn(cfv(ce1, c3)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c3))
} = {
  pwselbas(c0, c2, c2, co(c3, cpws, c2), c3, cfv(cbs, co(c3, cpws, c2)), ccrg, universe, wcel(c0, c1))
  eqid(co(c3, cpws, c2))
  a1i(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, universe))
  fvexi(c2, cbs, c3)
  sseldd(c0, cfv(cbs, co(c3, cpws, c2)), c1, wcel(c0, c1))
  3syl(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c1, cfv(cbs, co(c3, cpws, c2))), wcel(c3, ccrg), wcel(c1, cfv(csubrg, co(c3, cpws, c2))))
  pf1rcl(c0, c1, c3)
  pf1subrg(c3, c1, c2)
  subrgss(c1, co(c3, cpws, c2), cfv(cbs, co(c3, cpws, c2)))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, co(c3, cpws, c2)))
  id(wcel(c0, c1))
}

thm pf1addcl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(co(c0, cof(c3), c2), c1))
  -| wceq(c1, crn(cfv(ce1, c4)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cplusg, c4))
} = {
  eqeltrrd(co(c0, cof(c3), c2), c1, co(c0, cfv(cplusg, co(c4, cpws, cfv(cbs, c4))), c2), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)))
  pwsplusgval(c0, cfv(cplusg, co(c4, cpws, cfv(cbs, c4))), c2, c3, co(c4, cpws, cfv(cbs, c4)), c4, cfv(cbs, c4), cfv(cbs, co(c4, cpws, cfv(cbs, c4))), ccrg, universe, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)))
  fvexd(cbs, c4, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)))
  mpbird(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(c0, cfv(cbs, co(c4, cpws, cfv(cbs, c4)))), wf(c0, cfv(cbs, c4), cfv(cbs, c4)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wf(c0, cfv(cbs, c4), cfv(cbs, c4)))
  pf1f(c0, c1, cfv(cbs, c4), c4)
  sylancl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wb(wcel(c0, cfv(cbs, co(c4, cpws, cfv(cbs, c4)))), wf(c0, cfv(cbs, c4), cfv(cbs, c4))), wcel(c4, ccrg), wcel(cfv(cbs, c4), universe))
  pwselbasb(c4, ccrg, cfv(cbs, c4), universe, c0, cfv(cbs, co(c4, cpws, cfv(cbs, c4))), cfv(cbs, c4), co(c4, cpws, cfv(cbs, c4)))
  mpbird(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cbs, co(c4, cpws, cfv(cbs, c4)))), wf(c2, cfv(cbs, c4), cfv(cbs, c4)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wf(c2, cfv(cbs, c4), cfv(cbs, c4)))

  fvex(cbs, c4)
  pwselbasb(c4, ccrg, cfv(cbs, c4), universe, c2, cfv(cbs, co(c4, cpws, cfv(cbs, c4))), cfv(cbs, c4), co(c4, cpws, cfv(cbs, c4)))

  eqid(cfv(cbs, co(c4, cpws, cfv(cbs, c4))))

  pf1subrg(c4, c1, cfv(cbs, c4))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c4))
  3expib(wcel(c1, cfv(csubrg, co(c4, cpws, cfv(cbs, c4)))), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(co(c0, cfv(cplusg, co(c4, cpws, cfv(cbs, c4))), c2), c1))

blocks.name: pf1ind
blocks.content: Prove a property of polynomials by "structural" induction, under a simplified model of structure which loses the sum of products structure. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Jun-2015.)

thm evl1gsumaddval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {

  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 `(c1[gsum](s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ c3)))=(c4[gsum](s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(c0 ` c3))))

blocks.name: evl1varpw
blocks.content: Univariate polynomial evaluation maps the exponentiation of a variable to the exponentiation of the evaluated variable. Remark: in contrast to ~ evl1gsumadd , the proof is shorter using ~ evls1varpw instead of proving it directly. (Contributed by AV, 15-Sep-2019.)

thm evl1varpw(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), co(c1, cfv(cmg, cfv(cmgp, co(c4, cpws, c5))), cfv(c0, c3))))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(ce1, c4))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cpl1, c4))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(cmgp, c6))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cv1, c4))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cmg, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, ccrg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cn0))
} = {
  3eqtrd(cfv(c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), co(c1, cfv(cmg, cfv(cmgp, co(c4, cpws, c5))), cfv(c0, c3)), cfv(co(c4, ces1, c5), co(c1, cfv(cmg, cfv(cmgp, cfv(cpl1, co(c4, cress, c5)))), cfv(cv1, co(c4, cress, c5)))), co(c1, cfv(cmg, cfv(cmgp, co(c4, cpws, c5))), cfv(co(c4, ces1, c5), cfv(cv1, co(c4, cress, c5)))), w0)
  fveq12d(c0, co(c1, c2, c3), co(c4, ces1, c5), co(c1, cfv(cmg, cfv(cmgp, cfv(cpl1, co(c4, cress, c5)))), cfv(cv1, co(c4, cress, c5))), w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(c0, co(c4, ces1, c5)))
  oveq123d(c1, c2, c3, c1, cfv(cmg, cfv(cmgp, cfv(cpl1, co(c4, cress, c5)))), cfv(cv1, co(c4, cress, c5)), w0)
  syl5eq(c2, cfv(cmg, cfv(cmgp, cfv(cpl1, co(c4, cress, c5)))), cfv(cmg, cfv(cmgp, cfv(cpl1, c4))), w0)
  eqtri(c2, cfv(cmg, cfv(cmgp, cfv(cpl1, c4))), cfv(cmg, c7))
  fveq2i(cmg, c7, cfv(cmgp, cfv(cpl1, c4)))
  eqtri(c7, cfv(cmgp, cfv(cpl1, c4)), cfv(cmgp, c6))
  fveq2i(cmgp, c6, cfv(cpl1, c4))
  fveq2d(cmg, cfv(cmgp, cfv(cpl1, c4)), cfv(cmgp, cfv(cpl1, co(c4, cress, c5))), w0)
  fveq2d(cmgp, cfv(cpl1, c4), cfv(cpl1, co(c4, cress, c5)), w0)
  fveq2d(cpl1, c4, co(c4, cress, c5), w0)
  eqidd(c1, w0)
  evls1varpw(co(c4, ces1, c5), c1, cfv(cmg, cfv(cmgp, cfv(cpl1, co(c4, cress, c5)))), cfv(cv1, co(c4, cress, c5)), c4, c5, c5, co(c4, cress, c5), cfv(cpl1, co(c4, cress, c5)), cfv(cmgp, cfv(cpl1, co(c4, cress, c5))), w0)
  eqid(co(c4, ces1, c5))
  eqid(co(c4, cress, c5))
  eqid(cfv(cpl1, co(c4, cress, c5)))
  eqid(cfv(cmgp, cfv(cpl1, co(c4, cress, c5))))
  eqid(cfv(cv1, co(c4, cress, c5)))
  eqid(cfv(cmg, cfv(cmgp, cfv(cpl1, co(c4, cress, c5)))))
  3syl(w0, wcel(c5, cfv(csubrg, c4)), wcel(c4, ccrg), wcel(c4, crg))
  crngring(c4)
  subrgid(c4, c5)
  oveq2d(c1, cfv(cmg, cfv(cmgp, co(c4, cpws, c5))), cfv(co(c4, ces1, c5), cfv(cv1, co(c4, cress, c5))), cfv(c0, c3), w0)
  fveq12d(co(c4, ces1, c5), cfv(cv1, co(c4, cress, c5)), c0, c3, w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(co(c4, ces1, c5), c0))
  eqcomi(co(c4, ces1, c5), c0)
  evl1fval1(c0, c4, c5)
  eqcomd(cfv(cv1, co(c4, cress, c5)), c3, w0)
  syl5eq(c3, cfv(cv1, co(c4, cress, c5)), cfv(cv1, c4), w0)
  fveq2d(cv1, c4, co(c4, cress, c5), w0)
  eqcomd(c4, co(c4, cress, c5), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(co(c4, cress, c5), c4), wcel(c4, ccrg))
  ressid(c4, ccrg, c5)
}

thm evl1varpw(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 `(c1[c2]c3))=(c1[(.g `(mulGrp `(c4[^]c5)))](c0 ` c3)))
  ‚ä£ c0 =(eval1 ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c6 =(Poly1 ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c7 =(mulGrp ` c6)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(var1 ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(Base ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(.g ` c7)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚àà CRing)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà ‚Ñï0)
} = {
  3eqtrd((c0 `(c1[c2]c3)), (c1[(.g `(mulGrp `(c4[^]c5)))](c0 ` c3)), ((c4[evalSub1]c5)`(c1[(.g `(mulGrp `(Poly1 `(c4[|`s]c5))))](var1 `(c4[|`s]c5)))), (c1[(.g `(mulGrp `(c4[^]c5)))]((c4[evalSub1]c5)`(var1 `(c4[|`s]c5)))), w0)
  fveq12d(c0, (c1[c2]c3), (c4[evalSub1]c5), (c1[(.g `(mulGrp `(Poly1 `(c4[|`s]c5))))](var1 `(c4[|`s]c5))), w0)
  a1i(w0, c0 =(c4[evalSub1]c5))
  oveq123d(c1, c2, c3, c1, (.g `(mulGrp `(Poly1 `(c4[|`s]c5)))), (var1 `(c4[|`s]c5)), w0)
  syl5eq(c2, (.g `(mulGrp `(Poly1 `(c4[|`s]c5)))), (.g `(mulGrp `(Poly1 ` c4))), w0)
  eqtri(c2, (.g `(mulGrp `(Poly1 ` c4))), (.g ` c7))
  fveq2i(cmg, c7, (mulGrp `(Poly1 ` c4)))
  eqtri(c7, (mulGrp `(Poly1 ` c4)), (mulGrp ` c6))
  fveq2i(cmgp, c6, (Poly1 ` c4))
  fveq2d(cmg, (mulGrp `(Poly1 ` c4)), (mulGrp `(Poly1 `(c4[|`s]c5))), w0)
  fveq2d(cmgp, (Poly1 ` c4), (Poly1 `(c4[|`s]c5)), w0)
  fveq2d(cpl1, c4, (c4[|`s]c5), w0)
  eqidd(c1, w0)
  evls1varpw((c4[evalSub1]c5), c1, (.g `(mulGrp `(Poly1 `(c4[|`s]c5)))), (var1 `(c4[|`s]c5)), c4, c5, c5, (c4[|`s]c5), (Poly1 `(c4[|`s]c5)), (mulGrp `(Poly1 `(c4[|`s]c5))), w0)
  eqid((c4[evalSub1]c5))
  eqid((c4[|`s]c5))
  eqid((Poly1 `(c4[|`s]c5)))
  eqid((mulGrp `(Poly1 `(c4[|`s]c5))))
  eqid((var1 `(c4[|`s]c5)))
  eqid((.g `(mulGrp `(Poly1 `(c4[|`s]c5)))))
  3syl(w0, c5 ‚àà(SubRing ` c4), c4 ‚àà CRing, c4 ‚àà Ring)
  crngring(c4)
  subrgid(c4, c5)
  oveq2d(c1, (.g `(mulGrp `(c4[^]c5))), ((c4[evalSub1]c5)`(var1 `(c4[|`s]c5))), (c0 ` c3), w0)
  fveq12d((c4[evalSub1]c5), (var1 `(c4[|`s]c5)), c0, c3, w0)
  a1i(w0, (c4[evalSub1]c5)= c0)
  eqcomi((c4[evalSub1]c5), c0)
  evl1fval1(c0, c4, c5)
  eqcomd((var1 `(c4[|`s]c5)), c3, w0)
  syl5eq(c3, (var1 `(c4[|`s]c5)), (var1 ` c4), w0)
  fveq2d(cv1, c4, (c4[|`s]c5), w0)
  eqcomd(c4, (c4[|`s]c5), w0)
  syl(w0, (c4[|`s]c5)= c4, c4 ‚àà CRing)
  ressid(c4, ccrg, c5)

blocks.name: evl1varpwval
blocks.content: Value of a univariate polynomial evaluation mapping the exponentiation of a variable to the exponentiation of the evaluated variable. (Contributed by AV, 14-Sep-2019.)

thm evl1varpwval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, class c10, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cfv(c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), c4), co(c1, c5, c4)))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(ce1, c6))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(cpl1, c6))
  -| wceq(c8, cfv(cmgp, c7))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cv1, c6))
  -| wceq(c9, cfv(cbs, c6))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cmg, c8))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, ccrg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cn0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c9))
  -| wceq(c10, cfv(cmgp, c6))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cmg, c10))
} = {
  simprd(w0, wceq(cfv(cfv(c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), c4), co(c1, c5, c4)), wcel(co(c1, c2, c3), cfv(cbs, c7)))
  evl1expd(c1, c2, c3, cfv(cbs, c7), c0, c4, c5, c4, c6, c7, c9, w0)
  evl1vard(c3, cfv(cbs, c7), c0, c4, c6, c9, c7, w0)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c7))
  eqtri(c2, cfv(cmg, cfv(cmgp, c7)), cfv(cmg, c8))
  fveq2i(cmg, c8, cfv(cmgp, c7))
  eqtri(c5, cfv(cmg, cfv(cmgp, c6)), cfv(cmg, c10))
  fveq2i(cmg, c10, cfv(cmgp, c6))
}

thm evl1varpwval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, class c10, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí((c0 `(c1[c2]c3))` c4)=(c1[c5]c4))
  ‚ä£ c0 =(eval1 ` c6)
  ‚ä£ c7 =(Poly1 ` c6)
  ‚ä£ c8 =(mulGrp ` c7)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(var1 ` c6)
  ‚ä£ c9 =(Base ` c6)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(.g ` c8)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c6 ‚àà CRing)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà ‚Ñï0)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚àà c9)
  ‚ä£ c10 =(mulGrp ` c6)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(.g ` c10)
} = {
  simprd(w0, ((c0 `(c1[c2]c3))` c4)=(c1[c5]c4), (c1[c2]c3)‚àà(Base ` c7))
  evl1expd(c1, c2, c3, (Base ` c7), c0, c4, c5, c4, c6, c7, c9, w0)
  evl1vard(c3, (Base ` c7), c0, c4, c6, c9, c7, w0)
  eqid((Base ` c7))
  eqtri(c2, (.g `(mulGrp ` c7)), (.g ` c8))
  fveq2i(cmg, c8, (mulGrp ` c7))
  eqtri(c5, (.g `(mulGrp ` c6)), (.g ` c10))
  fveq2i(cmg, c10, (mulGrp ` c6))

  syl(w0, wcel(c10, casa), wcel(c9, ccrg))

  asclmul1(c10, c1, cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c10)), co(c3, c4, c5), cfv(cbs, c10), cfv(cascl, c10), cfv(cmulr, c10), c2, cfv(csca, c10))
